CHAT.comment: GLORIA BARTNICKI AND ANTHONY F. KANE, JR., Petitioners v. FREDERICK W. VOPPER, AKA FRED WILLIAMS, ET AL.; and UNITED STATES, Petitioner v. FREDERICK W. VOPPER, AKA FRED WILLIAMS, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:03 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF JEREMIAH A. COLLINS ON BEHALF OF PRIVATE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SETH P. WAXMAN ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER UNITED STATES
ORAL ARGUMENT OF LEE LEVINE ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS VOPPER, ET AL.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THOMAS C. GOLDSTEIN ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT YOCUM
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF SETH P. WAXMAN ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER UNITED STATES
(Whereupon, at 12:03 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
